sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getPortfolio, getClient, getTags, getCategories } from '../../../helper/portfoliohelper'; import Sidebar from '../../layouts/Portfoliosidebar'; class Content extends Component { render() { const portfolioId = this.props.portfolioId; const item = getPortfolio(portfolioId); return (
  • Project Name

    {item.title}

  • Client Name {getClient(item.author).map((client, i) => (

    {client.name}

    ))}
  • Date

    {item.postdate}

  • Tag

    {getTags(item.tags).slice(0, 3).map((tags, i) => ( {tags.title}, ))}

{getCategories(item.category).map((category, i) => ( {category.title} ))}

{item.title}

); } } export default Content;
